thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: Bridgette Lewis
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Bridgette Lewis

author: Bridgette Lewis
title: Bridgette Lewis
text: I've ordered from Elevated Styles before. Their service is quick and the units are modestly priced. I ordered the Mommy wig which is part of the Janet collection. The unit is soft there was a bit shedding with this unit but it was soft to the touch. I was a bit surprised and someone disappointed the wig and color I choose was so dark it didn't work well with golden Carmel skin tone. Other than that if Eleveted had my color in stock I would the mommy wig again. But instead I order the insta fab wig from amazon in my signature gold color.
